mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usertbl(uid, upass, name, nickname, email, postCode, address, addressSpecific, region1, region2, region3, signupDate, authority, grade) VALUES (#{uid}, #{upass}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{addressSpecific}, #{region1}, #{region2}, #{region3}, now(), 1, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT uid, upass,postCode, nickname, address,addressSpecific, name, email, region1, region2, region3 FROM usertbl WHERE uid = #{uid} AND upass = #{upass}
SELECT uid, name, upass, email, address, postCode, addressSpecific, nickname FROM usertbl
select count(*) from usertbl where uid = #{uid}
select count(*) from usertbl where nickname = #{nickname}
